import React, {Component} from 'react' import { API_ROOT } from '../constants'; import { Image } from 'semantic-ui-react' import dahlia from "../images/DahliaHeader.jpg" class HomeContainer extends Component { state = { user: {} } componentDidMount() { this.getProfile() } getProfile = () => { let token = localStorage.getItem('jwt') if (token) { fetch(`${API_ROOT}/profile`, { headers: { 'Authorization': 'Bearer ' + token } }) .then(resp => resp.json()) .then(json => { console.log('profile:', json) const {username, plant_care_rating, avatar} = json.user this.setState({ user: { username, plant_care_rating, avatar} }) }) } } renderProfile = () => { return

Welcome Home {this.state ? this.state.user.name : null}

} render() { return (
Hello World
